Package org.drip.measure.continuous

Class R1Univariate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.measure.continuous.R1Univariate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoundedUniformIntegerDistribution, PoissonDistribution, R1Uniform, R1UnivariateExponential, R1UnivariateNormal, R1UnivariateUniform
    public abstract class R1Univariate
extends java.lang.Object
    R1Univariate implements the Base Abstract Class behind R1 Univariate Distributions. It exports the Methods for incremental, cumulative, and inverse cumulative distribution densities.

    • Module = Numerical Core Module
    • Library = Numerical Optimizer Library
    • Project = Measure
    • Package = Continuous
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
